question_text: Does your organization have an established ISMS?
Is there a documented information security policy?
Are risk assessments conducted at regular intervals?
Is there a process for evaluating the effectiveness of controls?
Is top management involved in the ISMS?
Are information security roles and responsibilities defined?
Is security awareness training provided to employees?
Is there a process for managing security incidents?
Are physical security measures in place to protect information assets?
Is there a process for managing access control?
Does ISO/IEC 27001 apply to all types of organizations?
Are all information assets included in the ISMS scope?
Is there a documented scope statement for the ISMS?
Are third-party vendors assessed for compliance with security policies?
Are sensitive data handling procedures defined and documented?
Is there a process for internal audits of the ISMS?
Are corrective actions taken for identified non-conformities?
Is management review conducted at defined intervals?
Are records of ISMS activities maintained?
Are security controls updated based on the risk assessment findings?
Are performance metrics established for the ISMS?
Is there a process for reviewing and improving the ISMS?
Are training and awareness programs regularly evaluated?
Is stakeholder feedback considered in ISMS improvements?
Are security incidents analyzed to improve the ISMS?
Is there a commitment to continuous improvement in security practices?
Is there a process for evaluating the adequacy of information security policies?
Are changes in legislation affecting the ISMS monitored?
Is there a process for reporting security incidents to authorities?
Are ISMS resources allocated appropriately?
Is there a process for managing knowledge related to information security?
Are there regular assessments of external threats to information security?
Are security controls regularly tested and updated?
Is there a business continuity plan that aligns with the ISMS?
Is there a process for ensuring compliance with security policies?
Is there a framework for managing security risks?
Are there procedures for handling personal data in compliance with GDPR?
Is there a process for reporting breaches of personal data?
Is there a process for ensuring data minimization in data handling?
Is there a documented policy for the retention and disposal of information?
